business_description: A small web design studio in Austin that builds custom landing pages for local startups. They focus on clean layouts and fast-loading sites.
A family-run pizza place in Chicago offering wood-fired sourdough pizzas and weekly seasonal specials.
A London-based copywriting agency helping tech companies write clear product pages and newsletters.
A Toronto dog walking service that offers GPS-tracked walks and photo updates after every stroll.
A Melbourne yoga studio with early morning classes for office workers and slow-flow sessions in the evening.
An online photography course platform teaching beginners how to shoot and edit with just a smartphone.
A New York tutoring service that helps high school students prepare for math and science exams.
A Berlin music school offering group guitar lessons for adults who are complete beginners.
A cozy neighborhood bookstore café in Copenhagen that serves specialty coffee alongside a curated selection of contemporary fiction. The space regularly hosts small reading circles and poetry nights.
An online coaching platform that helps junior software developers prepare for technical interviews. It offers mock interviews, feedback, and structured practice plans.
A small artisan cheese shop in Zurich focusing on Swiss alpine cheeses and seasonal specialties. They also run tasting evenings for small groups.
A fully remote design studio that creates brand identities and landing pages for early-stage SaaS startups. Projects are delivered in compact, two-week sprints.
A local brewery in Manchester known for experimental IPAs and rotating guest taps. The taproom regularly invites food trucks and live bands on weekends.
A Berlin-based startup building an AI tool that helps HR teams screen and summarize CVs. The system highlights key skills and potential red flags for recruiters.
A web-first marketplace where independent candle makers can sell small-batch, hand-poured candles. Customers can filter by scent profile, wax type, and region.
A Los Angeles photography studio specializing in lifestyle content for social media influencers. Services include photo shoots, short-form video, and editing support.
A Dublin-based bike shop selling refurbished bicycles and offering maintenance classes for beginners. Customers can book tune-ups online.
An online course hub that teaches small business owners how to run their own digital marketing. Lessons cover SEO, email campaigns, and paid ads on a budget.
A family-run farm shop on the outskirts of London selling fresh produce, homemade jams, and baked goods. They also offer weekly vegetable boxes.
A Toronto yoga studio aimed at office workers, offering short lunchtime classes and after-work wind-down sessions. They emphasize accessibility and stress relief.
A New York-based online florist specializing in minimalist bouquets and same-day Manhattan delivery. Arrangements are designed with a modern, urban aesthetic.
An online platform that helps teachers create interactive quizzes and polls for their classrooms. Results are visualized in real time during lessons.
A Cape Town surfboard shaping studio producing custom boards for local surfers. They work closely with clients on dimensions, artwork, and fin setups.
A Melbourne home-organizing service that helps busy families declutter and design functional storage solutions. They offer both in-person visits and virtual consultations.
A small bakery in Boston specializing in naturally leavened breads and laminated pastries. Weekend pre-order boxes often sell out within hours.
A Lisbon coworking space designed for freelance writers and journalists. It offers quiet zones, private booths, and occasional editorial workshops.
A Helsinki indie game studio creating narrative-driven puzzle games for mobile and PC. Their titles focus on cozy atmospheres and gentle storytelling.
A web app that helps remote teams run asynchronous brainstorming sessions. Ideas can be voted on and grouped into themes for follow-up.
Una cafetería de especialidad en Sevilla que tuesta su propio café y ofrece métodos de filtrado manual. Los clientes pueden comprar granos para casa.
Un estudio de diseño en Ciudad de México que crea identidades visuales para pequeñas marcas locales. Ofrecen desde logotipos hasta empaques completos.
Una tienda de plantas en Bogotá especializada en especies de interior de fácil cuidado. Organizan talleres mensuales para aprender sobre riego y trasplantes.
Un taller de panadería en Valencia centrado en panes integrales y masas madre. También imparten cursos para quienes quieren aprender a hacer pan en casa.
Una academia online que ayuda a profesionales hispanohablantes a mejorar su inglés de negocios mediante clases en vivo y ejercicios prácticos.
Une petite fromagerie à Lyon spécialisée dans les fromages fermiers locaux. La boutique propose aussi des plateaux dégustation pour événements.
Un salon de thé à Bordeaux offrant une large sélection de thés en vrac et de pâtisseries maison. Des séances de dégustation guidée sont organisées le soir.
Un atelier de design graphique à Genève qui conçoit des affiches culturelles pour musées et festivals locaux.
Une boutique en ligne française vendant des accessoires de papeterie minimalistes et fabriqués à la main, comme carnets et stylos.
Une microbrasserie à Bruxelles produisant des bières artisanales en petites séries. Les visiteurs peuvent réserver des visites et dégustations.
Eine Hamburger Kaffeerösterei, die Single-Origin-Bohnen in kleinen Chargen röstet. Im angeschlossenen Café werden Barista-Kurse angeboten.
Ein kleines Architekturbüro in Zürich, das sich auf energieeffiziente Umbauten von Altbauten spezialisiert hat.
Ein Kölner Yogastudio mit Fokus auf entspannenden Abendkursen für Berufstätige. Es gibt auch regelmäßige Meditationsabende.
Eine Bäckerei in Wien, die sich auf Strudel und traditionelle österreichische Mehlspeisen konzentriert. Viele Rezepte stammen aus Familienarchiven.
Una pasticceria artigianale a Torino specializzata in biscotti e torte da forno, preparati con ingredienti locali di alta qualità.
Un negozio di biciclette a Roma che offre sia vendita che noleggio, rivolto soprattutto ai turisti che vogliono esplorare la città su due ruote.
Un piccolo ristorante a Napoli che reinterpreta la pizza classica in chiave moderna, con impasti speciali e topping stagionali.
Uma pequena livraria em Lisboa dedicada a livros de poesia e edições independentes. O espaço também acolhe leituras e lançamentos.
Uma escola de surf em Florianópolis que oferece aulas para iniciantes e pacotes de fim de semana com hospedagem incluída.
一间位于成都的小众咖啡馆，主打手冲咖啡和自制甜品。店内氛围安静，适合工作和阅读。
一家位于广州的花艺工作室，专注于现代极简风格的花束和婚礼布置。提供上门布场服务。
京都の小さなカフェで、抹茶ラテや季節の和菓子を提供している。観光客にも地元の人にも人気の落ち着いた空間だ。
札幌のクラフトビールバーで、北海道産の素材を使った限定ビールを楽しめる。週末にはライブ演奏も行われる。
서울의 독립 서점으로, 소규모 출판사와 에세이 위주의 책을 큐레이션한다. 작가와의 북토크도 자주 열린다.
부산 해변가에 위치한 디저트 카페로, 계절 과일을 활용한 케이크와 음료가 인기다.
한양 인근에 위치한 소규모 도예 공방으로, 수제 머그컵과 접시를 소량 생산하며 원데이 클래스를 운영한다.
Арт-студия в Киеве, где проходят курсы по рисунку и живописи для взрослых. Работы учеников регулярно выставляются в небольшом зале.
Йога-центр в Одессе с видом на море, предлагающий утренние занятия и выездные ретриты на выходных.
एक छोटी सी किताबों की दुकान जयपुर में स्थित है, जहाँ हिंदी और राजस्थानी साहित्य पर खास ध्यान दिया जाता है। दुकान में नियमित रूप से कवि सम्मेलन भी होते हैं।
मुंबई में एक फिटनेस स्टूडियो जो सुबह की योग कक्षाओं और शाम की स्ट्रेंथ ट्रेनिंग सेशन्स पर ध्यान देता है। कामकाजी पेशेवरों के लिए अनुकूल समय सारिणी है।
दिल्ली की एक छोटी सी बेकरी जो केक, कुकीज़ और त्योहारों के लिए विशेष मिठाइयाँ बनाती है। ऑर्डर ऑनलाइन भी किए जा सकते हैं।
مقهى صغير في عمان يقدم قهوة متخصصة وحلويات منزلية الصنع. الأجواء هادئة ومناسبة للعمل على الحاسوب المحمول.
محل زهور في الدار البيضاء يقدّم باقات حديثة التصميم وخدمة توصيل للمنازل والشركات. يتم استخدام زهور موسمية طازجة.
Krakowska kawiarnia serwująca kawę z lokalnych palarni oraz domowe ciasta. W lokalu odbywają się wieczory gier planszowych.
Mała pracownia ceramiczna w Gdańsku organizująca warsztaty oraz sprzedająca ręcznie robione naczynia do domu.
Vilniaus studija, kuri kuria minimalistinius interjero aksesuarus iš medžio ir metalo. Dirbiniai parduodami tiek vietoje, tiek internetu.
Rotterdams koffietentje dat zich richt op slow coffee en huisgemaakte taarten. De zaak trekt veel studenten en freelancers.
Een kleine yogastudio in Utrecht met nadruk op rustige, herstellende lessen en ademhalingsoefeningen.
Ένα μικρό στούντιο κεραμικής στη Θεσσαλονίκη που διοργανώνει μαθήματα για αρχάριους και προχωρημένους. Τα έργα πωλούνται και σε τοπικές αγορές.
